Module the_project
Package hotel

Class ReservationListManipulator

java.lang.Object
hotel.ReservationListManipulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
AddGivenObject, Get, RemoveGivenObject
public class ReservationListManipulator extends Object implements AddGivenObject, RemoveGivenObject, Get
Allows changes to be made to the Reservation object by the use of addEntry method and removeEntry method, as well as getEntry method. Includes method overloading
Since:
2022-03-15
Version:
7.0
Author:
Isaac, Yan kai, Davis, Wenlu, Tomoki

    • ReservationListManipulator

      public ReservationListManipulator(Hotel hotel)
      This is the Reservation List Manipulator
      Parameters:
      hotel - assigns hotel object to ReservationListManipulator so that the ReservationListManipulator can manipulate the reservation list in this hotel

  • Method Details

    • addEntry

      public void addEntry(Object daReservation) throws ArrayException
      To be called right after creating reservation (pass reservation object in). This method allows the reservation Object to be added; an ArrayExceotion would be thrown upon any error encountered
      Specified by:
      addEntry in interface AddGivenObject
      Parameters:
      daReservation - this is the object to be added into the Entry
      Throws:
      ArrayException - occurs upon an error and error message would be printed accordingly

    • removeEntry

      public void removeEntry(Object daReservation) throws ArrayException
      To be called in checkout function This method allows the reservation Object to be removed; an ArrayException would be thrown upon any error encountered
      Specified by:
      removeEntry in interface RemoveGivenObject
      Parameters:
      daReservation - this is the object to be removed from the Entry
      Throws:
      ArrayException - occurs upon an error and error message would be printed accordingly

    • getEntry

      public Reservation getEntry()
      To be called in checkin function this method allows the Reservation Object to be instantiated
      Specified by:
      getEntry in interface Get
      Returns:
      this is the Exception handling message

    • getEntry

      public Reservation getEntry(ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
      this method is the opposite of the above method; it returns the Reservation Object for the given ArrayList of reservation Method Overloading is used in this case
      Parameters:
      reservationList - this is the ArrayList of reservation for the Reservation object to be retrieved from
      Returns:
      this is the Reservation object that is retrieved

    • getRoomReservations

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getRoomReservations(Room room)
      this method is to be called in the make reservation class upon its instantiation
      Parameters:
      room - this is the Room object for which the arraylist of reservation can be retrieved from
      Returns:
      this is the arraylist that is retrieved
